titleStmt.title: Ancilla calligraphiæ or The handmaid to fair writing being an essey [sic] of the pen and graver. Performed for private divertisment and to please some particular friends by Thomas Weston gent alij multa persiciunt nos nonnulla conamur
titleStmt.author: Weston, Thomas, gent.

titleStmt.title: Ancilla calligraphiæ or The handmaid to fair writing being an essey [sic] of the pen and graver. Performed for private divertisment and to please some particular friends by Thomas Weston gent alij multa persiciunt nos nonnulla conamur
titleStmt.author: Weston, Thomas, gent.
White, Robert, 1645-1703, engraver.
Sturt, John, 1658-1730, engraver.
Elder, William, fl. 1680-1700, engraver.

notesStmt.note: Engraved throughout; some leaves variously signed, Jo. Sturt, Elder, R. White.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
